hero.title: Making legal help fast, clear, and accessible
hero.subtitle: E-Laws is your AI legal copilot ‚Äî built to answer questions, generate documents, and guide you through procedures with privacy by default.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.subtitle: People deserve understandable, actionable legal guidance ‚Äî not endless jargon and wait times. We combine reliable AI with country-aware context to help you draft, decide, and move forward.

points.citations: Clear citations and jurisdictional hints where relevant
points.control: No sale of your personal data ‚Äî you control exports
points.security: Role-based access and encryption at rest
points.editable: Human-readable docs you can edit and sign
